Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Sirius \Sir"i*us\, n. [L., fr. Gr. ???, properly, scorching.] (Astron.) The Dog Star. See {Dog Star}. [1913 Webster]
Sirius n : the brightest star in the sky; in Canis Major [syn: {Dog Star}, {Canicula}, {Sothis}]
